revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #55 Custap |image = [[File:Custap.png]] |caption = The flesh underneath the Custap Berry's tough skin is sweet and creamy soft. |growtime = 7h 36m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,700 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *40 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Custap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of sweet on the field. The [[Watmel]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 54 mins || 2 hours 18 mins || 3 hours 42 mins || 7 hours 36 mins - 15 hours 12 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 7 hours 36 mins -
15 hours 12 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 5 hours 4 mins -
10 hours 8 mins || 61 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 3 hours 22 mins 40 secs -
6 hours 45 mins 20 secs || 41 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Custap berries.
